title: new client wont open
body: after i hit launch my LoL just disappears, please help i really wanna play xD. [edit] this has been happening since the new client was released

replies.body: Hi. I'm having the same issue and quite frankly am starting to get pretty mad lol I've tried EVERYTHING. including the stupid troubleshoot. It did nothing. And i restarted my computer. That didnt work either.

Hello,

Sorry to hear about your issues. Have you tried restarting your machine? Sometimes programs get "stuck" when you try to close them, and a full restart of your machine can clear that bad state.

Thanks!
